articles.title: Racing world to sweat for months on Melbourne Cup review - Racenet
articles.description: Racing participants around the globe will have to wait until at least March next year to find out whether tough new veterinary protocols designed to protect the Melbourne Cup will be wound back or be just as stringent next year.
